mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.clinic_id AS "clinicId", a.visit_id AS "visitId", a.presc_date AS "prescDate", a.presc_no AS "prescNo", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.dispensary AS "dispensary", a.patient_id AS "patientId", a.name AS "name", a.name_phonetic AS "namePhonetic", a.identity AS "identity", a.charge_type AS "chargeType", a.unit_in_contract AS "unitInContract", a.presc_type AS "prescType", a.presc_attr AS "prescAttr", a.presc_source AS "prescSource", a.repetition AS "repetition", a.costs AS "costs", a.ordered_by AS "orderedBy", a.prescribed_by AS "prescribedBy", a.entered_by AS "enteredBy", a.dispensing_provider AS "dispensingProvider", a.count_per_repetition AS "countPerRepetition", a.entered_datetime AS "enteredDatetime", a.dispensing_datetime AS "dispensingDatetime", a.memo AS "memo", a.sub_storage AS "subStorage", a.flag AS "flag", a.doctor_user AS "doctorUser", a.entered_datatime AS "enteredDatatime", a.verify_by AS "verifyBy", a.discharge_taking_indicator AS "dischargeTakingIndicator", a.payments AS "payments", a.decoction AS "decoction", a.verified_datetime AS "verifiedDatetime", a.rcpt_no AS "rcptNo", a.original_presc_date AS "originalPrescDate", a.original_presc_no AS "originalPrescNo", a.return_visit_no AS "returnVisitNo", a.return_visit_date AS "returnVisitDate", a.batch_provide_no AS "batchProvideNo", a.dispensation_by AS "dispensationBy", a.dispensation_date AS "dispensationDate", a.cfbh_mz AS "cfbhMz", a.fhr_mz AS "fhrMz", a.fhbz_mz AS "fhbzMz", a.bz_mz AS "bzMz", a.hsph AS "hsph", a.ffph AS "ffph", a.dispensary_sub AS "dispensarySub", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drug_presc_master( id, clinic_id, visit_id, presc_date, presc_no, org_id, dispensary, patient_id, name, name_phonetic, identity, charge_type, unit_in_contract, presc_type, presc_attr, presc_source, repetition, costs, ordered_by, prescribed_by, entered_by, dispensing_provider, count_per_repetition, entered_datetime, dispensing_datetime, memo, sub_storage, flag, doctor_user, entered_datatime, verify_by, discharge_taking_indicator, payments, decoction, verified_datetime, rcpt_no, original_presc_date, original_presc_no, return_visit_no, return_visit_date, batch_provide_no, dispensation_by, dispensation_date, cfbh_mz, fhr_mz, fhbz_mz, bz_mz, hsph, ffph, dispensary_sub, create_date, create_by, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{clinicId}, #{visitId}, #{prescDate}, #{prescNo}, #{orgId}, #{dispensary}, #{patientId}, #{name}, #{namePhonetic}, #{identity}, #{chargeType}, #{unitInContract}, #{prescType}, #{prescAttr}, #{prescSource}, #{repetition}, #{costs}, #{orderedBy}, #{prescribedBy}, #{enteredBy}, #{dispensingProvider}, #{countPerRepetition}, #{enteredDatetime}, #{dispensingDatetime}, #{memo}, #{subStorage}, #{flag}, #{doctorUser}, #{enteredDatatime}, #{verifyBy}, #{dischargeTakingIndicator}, #{payments}, #{decoction}, #{verifiedDatetime}, #{rcptNo}, #{originalPrescDate}, #{originalPrescNo}, #{returnVisitNo}, #{returnVisitDate}, #{batchProvideNo}, #{dispensationBy}, #{dispensationDate}, #{cfbhMz}, #{fhrMz}, #{fhbzMz}, #{bzMz}, #{hsph}, #{ffph}, #{dispensarySub}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE drug_presc_master SET clinic_id = #{clinicId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, presc_date = #{prescDate}, presc_no = #{prescNo}, org_id = #{orgId}, dispensary = #{dispensary}, patient_id = #{patientId}, name = #{name}, name_phonetic = #{namePhonetic}, identity = #{identity}, charge_type = #{chargeType}, unit_in_contract = #{unitInContract}, presc_type = #{prescType}, presc_attr = #{prescAttr}, presc_source = #{prescSource}, repetition = #{repetition}, costs = #{costs}, ordered_by = #{orderedBy}, prescribed_by = #{prescribedBy}, entered_by = #{enteredBy}, dispensing_provider = #{dispensingProvider}, count_per_repetition = #{countPerRepetition}, entered_datetime = #{enteredDatetime}, dispensing_datetime = #{dispensingDatetime}, memo = #{memo}, sub_storage = #{subStorage}, flag = #{flag}, doctor_user = #{doctorUser}, entered_datatime = #{enteredDatatime}, verify_by = #{verifyBy}, discharge_taking_indicator = #{dischargeTakingIndicator}, payments = #{payments}, decoction = #{decoction}, verified_datetime = #{verifiedDatetime}, rcpt_no = #{rcptNo}, original_presc_date = #{originalPrescDate}, original_presc_no = #{originalPrescNo}, return_visit_no = #{returnVisitNo}, return_visit_date = #{returnVisitDate}, batch_provide_no = #{batchProvideNo}, dispensation_by = #{dispensationBy}, dispensation_date = #{dispensationDate}, cfbh_mz = #{cfbhMz}, fhr_mz = #{fhrMz}, fhbz_mz = #{fhbzMz}, bz_mz = #{bzMz}, hsph = #{hsph}, ffph = #{ffph}, dispensary_sub = #{dispensarySub}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
